verses.verse: Therefore, thou<WH859> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> Gog,<WH1463> and say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH413> thee, O Gog,<WH1463> the chief<WH7218> prince<WH5387> of Meshech<WH4902> and Tubal: <WH8422>

And I will turn thee back,<WH7725> and leave but the sixth part<WH8338> of thee, and will cause thee to come up<WH5927> from the north<WH6828> parts,<WH4480> <WH3411> and will bring<WH935> thee upon<WH5921> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel: <WH3478>
And I will smite<WH5221> thy bow<WH7198> out of thy left<WH8040> hand,<WH4480> <WH3027> and will cause thine arrows<WH2671> to fall<WH5307> out of thy right<WH3225> hand.<WH4480> <WH3027>

Thou shalt fall<WH5307> upon<WH5921> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel,<WH3478> thou,<WH859> and all<WH3605> thy bands,<WH102> and the people<WH5971> that<WH834> is with<WH854> thee: I will give<WH5414> thee unto the ravenous<WH5861> birds<WH6833> of every<WH3605> sort,<WH3671> and to the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> to be devoured.<WH402>
Thou shalt fall<WH5307> upon<WH5921> the open<WH6440> field:<WH7704> for<WH3588> I<WH589> have spoken<WH1696> it, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
And I will send<WH7971> a fire<WH784> on Magog,<WH4031> and among them that dwell<WH3427> carelessly<WH983> in the isles:<WH339> and they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

So will I make<WH3045> my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> known<WH3045> in the midst<WH8432> of my people<WH5971> Israel;<WH3478> and I will not<WH3808> let them pollute<WH2490> <WH853> my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> any more:<WH5750> and the heathen<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD,<WH3068> the Holy One<WH6918> in Israel.<WH3478>
Behold, <WH2009> it is come,<WH935> and it is done,<WH1961> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> this<WH1931> is the day<WH3117> whereof<WH834> I have spoken.<WH1696>

And they that dwell<WH3427> in the cities<WH5892> of Israel<WH3478> shall go forth,<WH3318> and shall set on fire<WH1197> and burn<WH5400> the weapons,<WH5402> both the shields<WH4043> and the bucklers,<WH6793> the bows<WH7198> and the arrows,<WH2671> and the handstaves,<WH4731> <WH3027> and the spears,<WH7420> and they shall burn<WH1197> them with fire<WH784> seven<WH7651> years: <WH8141>

So that they shall take<WH5375> no<WH3808> wood<WH6086> out of<WH4480> the field,<WH7704> neither<WH3808> cut down<WH2404> any out of<WH4480> the forests;<WH3293> for<WH3588> they shall burn<WH1197> the weapons<WH5402> with fire:<WH784> and they shall spoil<WH7997> <WH853> those that spoiled<WH7997> them, and rob<WH962> <WH853> those that robbed<WH962> them, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

And it shall come to pass<WH1961> in that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> that I will give<WH5414> unto Gog<WH1463> a place<WH4725> there<WH8033> of graves<WH6913> in Israel,<WH3478> the valley<WH1516> of the passengers<WH5674> on the east<WH6926> of the sea:<WH3220> and it<WH1931> shall stop<WH2629> <WH853> the noses of the passengers:<WH5674> and there<WH8033> shall they bury<WH6912> <WH853> Gog<WH1463> and all<WH3605> his multitude:<WH1995> and they shall call<WH7121> it The valley<WH1516> of Hamon-gog.<WH1996>
And seven<WH7651> months<WH2320> shall the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> be burying<WH6912> of them, that<WH4616> they may cleanse<WH2891> <WH853> the land.<WH776>

Yea, all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall bury<WH6912> them; and it shall be<WH1961> to them a renown<WH8034> the day<WH3117> that I shall be glorified,<WH3513> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

And they shall sever out<WH914> men<WH376> of continual employment,<WH8548> passing<WH5674> through the land<WH776> to bury<WH6912> <WH853> with the passengers<WH5674> <WH853> those that remain<WH3498> upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth,<WH776> to cleanse<WH2891> it: after the end<WH4480> <WH7097> of seven<WH7651> months<WH2320> shall they search.<WH2713>

And the passengers<WH5674> that pass through<WH5674> the land,<WH776> when any seeth<WH7200> a man's<WH120> bone,<WH6106> then shall he set up<WH1129> a sign<WH6725> by<WH681> it, till<WH5704> the buriers<WH6912> have buried<WH6912> it in<WH413> the valley<WH1516> of Hamon-gog.<WH1996>
And also<WH1571> the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> shall be Hamonah.<WH1997> Thus shall they cleanse<WH2891> the land.<WH776>

And, thou<WH859> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Speak<WH559> unto every<WH3605> feathered<WH3671> fowl,<WH6833> and to every<WH3605> beast<WH2416> of the field,<WH7704> Assemble yourselves,<WH6908> and come;<WH935> gather yourselves<WH622> on every side<WH4480> <WH5439> to<WH5921> my sacrifice<WH2077> that<WH834> I<WH589> do sacrifice<WH2076> for you, even a great<WH1419> sacrifice<WH2077> upon<WH5921> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel,<WH3478> that ye may eat<WH398> flesh,<WH1320> and drink<WH8354> blood.<WH1818>

Ye shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the mighty,<WH1368> and drink<WH8354> the blood<WH1818> of the princes<WH5387> of the earth,<WH776> of rams,<WH352> of lambs,<WH3733> and of goats,<WH6260> of bullocks,<WH6499> all<WH3605> of them fatlings<WH4806> of Bashan.<WH1316>

And ye shall eat<WH398> fat<WH2459> till ye be full,<WH7654> and drink<WH8354> blood<WH1818> till ye be drunken,<WH7943> of my sacrifice<WH4480> <WH2077> which<WH834> I have sacrificed<WH2076> for you.

Thus ye shall be filled<WH7646> at<WH5921> my table<WH7979> with horses<WH5483> and chariots,<WH7393> with mighty men,<WH1368> and with all<WH3605> men<WH376> of war,<WH4421> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

And I will set<WH5414> <WH853> my glory<WH3519> among the heathen,<WH1471> and all<WH3605> the heathen<WH1471> shall see<WH7200> <WH853> my judgment<WH4941> that<WH834> I have executed,<WH6213> and my hand<WH3027> that<WH834> I have laid<WH7760> upon them.
So the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430> from<WH4480> that<WH1931> day<WH3117> and forward.<WH1973>

And the heathen<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> went into captivity<WH1540> for their iniquity:<WH5771> because<WH5921> <WH834> they trespassed<WH4603> against me, therefore hid<WH5641> I my face<WH6440> from<WH4480> them, and gave<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of their enemies:<WH6862> so fell<WH5307> they all<WH3605> by the sword.<WH2719>
According to their uncleanness<WH2932> and according to their transgressions<WH6588> have I done<WH6213> unto them, and hid<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from<WH4480> them.

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Now<WH6258> will I bring again<WH7725> <WH853> the captivity<WH7622> of Jacob,<WH3290> and have mercy<WH7355> upon the whole<WH3605> house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> and will be jealous<WH7065> for my holy<WH6944> name;<WH8034>

After that they have borne<WH5375> <WH853> their shame,<WH3639> and all<WH3605> their trespasses<WH4604> whereby<WH834> they have trespassed<WH4603> against me, when they dwelt<WH3427> safely<WH983> in<WH5921> their land,<WH127> and none<WH369> made them afraid.<WH2729>

When I have brought them again<WH7725> <WH853> from<WH4480> the people,<WH5971> and gathered<WH6908> them out of their enemies'<WH341> lands,<WH4480> <WH776> and am sanctified<WH6942> in them in the sight<WH5869> of many<WH7227> nations;<WH1471>

Then shall they know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> their God,<WH430> which caused them to be led into captivity<WH1540> among<WH413> the heathen:<WH1471> but I have gathered<WH3664> them unto<WH5921> their own land,<WH127> and have left<WH3498> none<WH3808> of<WH4480> them any more<WH5750> there.<WH8033>

Neither <WH3808> will I hide<WH5641> my face<WH6440> any more<WH5750> from<WH4480> them: for<WH834> I have poured out<WH8210> <WH853> my spirit<WH7307> upon<WH5921> the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
